Articles.Content:
So i decided to start designing and building a new engine/fuel tank system for a stock SSTO space plane, decided to test out the thrust and well it kinda went all the way into orbit without any of the plane parts being attached to it.

I wasted a hell of a lot of fuel getting there too, just went yolo and abused the delta v to get there (Has 10k liquid fuel and 10k oxidizer)

I mean i do not even know what i am going to do with this thing if i keep going, all i know is if i do it will be huge, just the engine is already over 200 parts.

If anyone is bored here is a download link.

Or heck if someone wants to do something with it while i build my plane, go for it.

http://www./download/1eb2e3gj75lei43/Goliath+engine.craft

Oh i forgot, when you launch it,

Press 1 and wait until the turbo jets are at 100% then press 2 and 3 to fire up the other engines then release the thing.

good luck on the way up.

at about 18,000m cut the turbo jets and throttle back to about 50% when the rapiers switch over.

Could make it go higher on air but this is just the engine remember that lol, its not supposed to be a rocket.

Turns out you can fly it kinda like a plane too.

Edited August 29, 2014 by Roflcopterkklol

That's an ion engine compared to some of my desings.

Nice craft though.

That's an ion engine compared to some of my desings.

Nice craft though.

I seem to be having a bit of trouble making a shell for it is my biggest problem atm lol, want it to en up looking something like Zeus, but having trouble getting the wings to not be stupid looking and have an area inside for all the equipment i want on the craft.

Edited August 30, 2014 by Roflcopterkklol
